Pathogen: Extended spectrum B-lactamase-producing Enterobacteriaceae (Klebsiella spp. Enterobacter & E. coli)
Carbapenem-resistant Enterobacteriaceae (Klebsiella spp. Enterobacter & E. coli)
Drug-resistant Neisseria gonorrhoeae (ceflixime, ceftriaxone, azithromycin, tetracycline)
Drug-resistant Campylobacter spp. (fluoroquinolone,  azithromycin or ciprofloxacin)
Drug-resistant non-typhoidal Salmonella (ceftriaxone, ciprofloxacin, or 5 or more drug classes)
